name: On The Rocks (☆goldstarstickrs☆)
description:
Hello members of the  NYU Game Center Incubator team and any others who stumble upon this page ! We hope you like our game !!

On The Rocks is a frantic 2d platform-fighting game, where your only weapon is the ground on which you stand

Note : we recommend playing with a Joycon controller connected to your computer through Bluetooth, but recognize this is not possible for all players

Up and Left Arrows to add keyboard players, +/- for gamepads

T to enter Target Mode, B to spawn Terrabots to fight

Backspace to reset

~

Player 1

  • WASD - move
  • c  - jump
  • v - push/pull rocks
  • left shift (hold) - aim/rock glide (in air)
  • e  - block
  • 1 - bow
  • 2- meditate (toggle)

Player 2

  • IJKL - move
  • . - jump
  • / - push/pull rocks
  • right shift (hold) - aim/rock glide (in air)
  • 9 - bow
  • o - block
  • 0 - meditate (toggle)

𝗢𝗻 𝗚𝗮𝗺𝗲𝗽𝗮𝗱

  • analog stick/d-pad - move
  • a - bend/select
  • b - jump/cancel
  • y - bow
  • x - meditate (toggle)
  • l1 - aim/rock glide (in air)
  • r1 - block
